casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. John Oscar HAVERLICK, Defendant-Appellant. No. 184, Docket 27388. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Jan. 10, 1963. Charles R. Rinaldo, Syracuse, N. Y., for defendant-appellant. James W. Dolan, Asst. U. S. Atty., N. D.N.Y., Albany, N. Y. (Justin J. Ma-honey, U. S. Atty., Albany, N. Y., on the brief), for plaintiff-appellee.

Before CLARK, KAUFMAN and HAYS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The conviction is affirmed in open court.
